armorEffects.name: Aristocrat's
armorEffects.description: Grants up to +20 Energy Resistance and Damage Resistance, the higher your caps

armorEffects.name: Auto Stim
armorEffects.description: Automatically use a Stimpak when hit while health is 25% or less, once every 60 seconds

armorEffects.name: Bolstering
armorEffects.description: Grants up to 35 Damage and Energy Resistance, the lower your health

armorEffects.name: Chameleon
armorEffects.description: Blend with the environment while sneaking and not moving

armorEffects.name: Cloaking
armorEffects.description: Being hit in melee generates a Stealth Field once per 30 seconds

armorEffects.name: Life Saving
armorEffects.description: While incapacitated, gain 50% chance to revive yourself with a Stimpak, once every 60 seconds

armorEffects.name: Mutant's
armorEffects.description: +10 Damage and Energy Resist if you are mutated

armorEffects.name: Nocturnal
armorEffects.description: +40 Damage and Energy Resistance increase at night

armorEffects.name: Overeater's
armorEffects.description: Increases Damage Reduction up to 6% as you fill your hunger and thirst meters

armorEffects.name: Regenerating
armorEffects.description: +0.05% health recovery while not in combat

armorEffects.name: Unyielding
armorEffects.description: Gain +3 to all stats (except END) when low on health

armorEffects.name: Vanguard's
armorEffects.description: Grants up to 35 Damage and Energy Resistance, the higher your health

armorEffects.name: Weightless
armorEffects.description: Weighs 90% less and does not count as armor for the Chameleon mutation

armorEffects.name: Antiseptic
armorEffects.description: +25% reduced disease chance from Environmental Hazards

armorEffects.name: Improved sneaking
armorEffects.description: +25% less noise while sneaking +25% reduce detection chance

armorEffects.name: Doctor's
armorEffects.description: +5% effecticeness from Stimpaks, RadAway, and Rad-X

armorEffects.name: Frozen
armorEffects.description: 5% chance to deal 100 Cryo Damage over 4 seconds to melee attackers

armorEffects.name: Electrified
armorEffects.description: 5% chance to deal 100 Energy Damage over 4 seconds to melee attackers

armorEffects.name: Burning
armorEffects.description: 5% chance to deal 100 Fire Damage over 4 seconds to melee attackers

armorEffects.name: Toxic
armorEffects.description: 5% chance to deal 100 Poison Damage over 4 seconds to melee attackers

armorEffects.name: Sentinel's
armorEffects.description: 75% chance to reduce damage by 15% while not moving

armorEffects.name: Cavalier's
armorEffects.description: 75% chance to reduce damage by 15% while sprinting

armorEffects.name: Reduced food/drink/chem weight
armorEffects.description: Food, drink and chem weights reduced by 20%

armorEffects.name: Diver's
armorEffects.description: Grants the ability to breathe underwater

armorEffects.name: Safecracker's
armorEffects.description: Increases size of sweet-spot while picking locks by 2
